CustomField.description: "Opportunity Region" auto populates User Region based on the Account Owner's Region. It is derived from the picklist "User Region" which is a value in user settings required for every user and represents the Region that the sales rep/account manager is selling into, or alternatively the operations or other personnel's primary regional location. It is first converted to a text field "User Region Desc" and used in formulas to calculate the Account and Opportunity Region. Via Celigo integrator.io, the Opportunity Region is mapped to the Netsuite Customer Sales Order Subsidiary.
